item.description:
Director: Guy Nattiv, Erez Tadmor
Country: Israel released 2007
Duration: 84 min.
Language: English / French / Hebrew / Arabic w/ subtitles

Synopsis
He’s Israeli, she’s Palestinian. They meet in Berlin during the frenzy of the World Cup finals where relief at running into somebody from “home” quickly turns to desire. Can love trump politics? Sexy, brave, and provocative, Strangers is a true high wire act. Working without a script, directors Erez Tadmor and Guy Nattiv shot on location on the fly and actors Lubna Azabel and Liron Levo improvised. Wondrously, the story emerged. Winner of Wolgin Award at the 2007 Jerusalem Film Festival and a Grand Jury Prize nominee at this year’s Sundance Film Festival.

Also official selections at:-

Tribecca Film Festival
San Francisco Jewish Film Festival
Taipei Intl Film Festival
Jerusalem Film Festival
...

Official Website
http://www.strangers....
(don't forget to watch the trailer, some hearts could just melt for that lovely soundtrack)

Boston Jewish Film Festival Website
http://www.bjff.org/...

Since it's starting at 9pm and ending at 10:30, lets meetup at 8:15pm at Cambridge Brewery (1 Kendall Square, Bldg 100 -- right behind Kendall Cinema) for a quick bite. If anyone is interested to discuss the movie afterward, I'm more than willing to join you at the brewery again!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meetup @8:15pm at Cambridge Brewery. I'll be out at the reception
item.name: Strangers -- Boston Jewish Film Festival
